src:
Bennacer Optimis Milan Bisa Beri Kekalahan Perdana pada Juventus
07 Nov 2019, 20:50 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Ismael Bennacer memperingatkan Juventus bahwa AC Milan bukanlah Lecce dan Rossoneri optimis bisa memberikan kekalahan perdana pada Bianconeri di kompetisi Serie A musim 2019-20 ini.
Juventus masih tetap perkasa pada musim ini. Meskipun, mereka berganti pelatih dari Massimiliano Allegri ke Maurizio Sarri.
Sejauh ini mereka belum tersentuh kekalahan di pentas Serie A. Akan tetapi mereka sudah dua kali menuai hasil imbang.
Yang pertama kontra Fiorentina di matchday ketiga. Bermain di kandang La Viola, Juventus ditahan 0-0.
Terbaru, mereka ditahan oleh Lecce di pekan kesembilan. Saat itu Juve hanya bisa mendapat hasil 1-1.
text:
Bennacer Optimistic Milan Can Give Prime defeat at Juventus
Nov 7 2019, 20:50 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Ismael Bennacer warned Juventus that AC Milan were not Lecce and the Rossoneri were optimistic they could give the Bianconeri their first defeat in the 2019-20 Serie A season.
Juventus are still strong this season. Although, they changed coaches from Massimiliano Allegri to Maurizio Sarri.
So far they have not been touched by defeat in the Serie A stage. However, they have already drawn two draws.
The first cons Fiorentina on the third matchday. Playing at home to La Viola, Juventus were held 0-0.
Most recently, they were detained by Lecce in the ninth week. At that time Juve could only get 1-1 results.
